Initializer# init(sourceGradient:sourceImage:gradientState:descriptor:)

iOS 11.3+iPadOS 11.3+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.13.4+tvOS 11.3+visionOS 1.0+

```
init(
    sourceGradient: MPSNNImageNode,
    sourceImage: MPSNNImageNode,
    gradientState: MPSNNGradientStateNode,
    descriptor: MPSNNNeuronDescriptor
)
```
